title: A Match Made in Heaven - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Fantasy   Josei   Romance   Shoujo   Xuanhuan
tags: Beast Companions   Beautiful Female Lead   Demons   Dense Protagonist   Determined Protagonist   Devoted Love Interests   Doting Parents   Female Protagonist   Fox Spirits   Handsome Male Lead   Honest Protagonist   Immortals   Military   Pragmatic Protagonist   Strong Love Interests
author: Shi Si Lang   十四郎
description:
This is an era where demons run rampant. The brave maiden has embarked on her journey…

It is said that a wife can be bought with money; then a husband can also be purchased. Xin Mei has nothing but money. She wants to buy herself a good-looking and useful husband…>
